creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings: Stamp in black ink, on verso lower left: D.F.P. [in circle] [Lugt 750a]
inscribed: in graphite, on verso lower left: Michel, Paris 1925
signed: Initialed in black crayon, lower center: C.P.

texts.textentryhtml:
1925, Michel, Paris.

1938, Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt to Princeton University Art Museum
texts.remarks: as published in Bib 6879 and as per inscription on verso
